name: plumberduck
text: This is one of my favorite Ray strips. It is not often that Ray gets to sass so effectively. It is good to see him sass.

name: brzbee
text: Nevermind favorite Ray strips, this is my favorite Ray story arc. He's just pure unadultered awesomeness throughout. From "Hooray man!" to getting kinda stoned to randomly finding 50 dollars. And this strip's closing line is so perfect.

name: eviltkat
text: True friends make you a Bloody Mary bong the morning after

name: saint
text: ah, friendship indeed.

name: lennysa
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: carlyle
text: Lyle's stomach is a black hole.

name: aderas
text: The other side of which us that jug.

name: duperando
text: This comment made absolutely no sense to me until I realized that the "us" should be an "is". It was like this mini-mystery that had kind of a lame outcome. But I will still chubby this because it made me think .

name: cuddlefish
text: yes. I love this strip. precious Ray moments.

name: stevegt500
text: NEW DAY!  NEW...DAAAY!

name: heatbag
text:
In Canada, we do Ceasar bongs the morning after.
Its almost the same as Bloody Mary bongs, but with 100% more clam juice.

name: pa_ass_nts
text: Ewwww

name: dumase
text: No we don't.

name: soticoto
text:
In Communist Russia, Caesar Bongs do you.
... Or at least in the Siberian parts closest to Canada.

name: thequietyou
text: Yakov Smirnoff said it....

name: numberkillinger
text: No he didn't.

name: salo
text:
But there's no clam juice in Bloody Marys?
Or was that the joke.

name: heatbag
text: There was a joke?

text: I take it you have not heard of Clamato oh the masochistic things people will do

text: High five!

text: both of you are effing gross.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: I say what Ray says in the last panel sometimes and it makes people think Im clever.

name: petitegitan
text: If I was Norman Rockwell, these are the every day scenes that I would paint.

name: direhaggis
text: Ray always wears a partially zipped jacket while sipping a martini and talking on the phone.

name: spinynorman
text: I think it came with the cell phone. That may be the only reason he bought the cell phone in the first place.

name: direhaggis
text: Designer fashion as an accessory to a cellphone. The Apocalypse is coming and it looks fabulous.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: chubbied for the latter half of your comment.

name: kylemcjuicy
text: Ah, friendship.

name: zyrelax
text: I laughed for a day straight after I read this one. I have adopted "NEW DAY! NEW...DAAAY" for waking people up.

name: varnish
text: This is true friendship. My friends wouldn't do this kind of thing, they'd just kick you in the nuts while cheerfully bellowing "Ey! Fuckface!"

name: deancain29
text: good sass

name: heavymetaljesus
text: Ugh, I hate Bloody Maries. Poor Lyle.

name: riazm
text: I was going to rail on you for not digging the Marys, but you're 16, it's fine, you'll come round one day. There's no rush.

name: hellofditties
text: At the risk of being unpopular, I too hate bloody marys.  It's like drinking cold soup, people.

name: numberkillinger
text: like gazpacho. with booze. its a good thing.

name: aliiis
text: Nonsense!

name: slog
text: Pure punchline action!

name: zoom
text:
"Not too much CD's got stolen"

using that after my next party.

name: werthog42
text: I like that the alt text tells you what car Norman Rockwell drives (however anachronistically) so that you can picture it perfectly.

name: spinynorman
text: This is the sort of strip that makes me say "God bless America" out loud no matter where I am

name: lost_buoy
text: Leyendecker already painted this scene prior to Rockwell's dominance of the Post. Then again, moments like this are archetypal as regards the visual American idiom, so Normy coulda pulled it off, no prob.

name: mxh
text: Leyendecker is the fucking MAN

name: fcannon
text: This is almost a dream come true for Lyle.

name: xiaomimi
text: If only they'd thought to make it a Red Snapper!

name: zeal
text: Lyle has drunk so much alcohol in his time that the substance has gone past damaging his liver and actually come back around as the substance which keeps him functioning.

name: ceres
text: Few things will bring you back to life as pleasantly as a Bloody Mary.

name: greenkoolayd
text: the whole "blood in the alcohol stream" dealie....

name: gussiejives
text: Zombie Rockwell's in the process of digging his easel out of his grave right now.

name: devin
text: My dad had a 1996 Mitsubishi Montero.  It kicked hella ass.  I can understand why Norman Rockwell would want to drive the 2005 Mitsubishi Montero perhaps in his town or just generally around.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Pat: Nice Pete's physical recovery technique. Jury's out.

name: mattylite
text:
What a way with the English language.
-much instead of many
-mary instead of marys maries mary's
It makes it seem like there is some stuff, some stuff called CDs, and also some stuff called bloody mary, and you can steal some of that stuff or get a bottle of that stuff. Like it is a homogenous stuff you can take any percent of instead of the individual, whole-numbered discs and drinks we usually talk about. Also, it is awesome.

name: hellofditties
text: ...What?

name: mattylite
text: Huh.  "mattylite gets sort of stoned," I guess.

name: atticusonline
text: My brain just melted.

name: heccibiggs
text: You could have said "Onstad turns 'CDs' into a non-count noun" for the exact same effect.

name: hellofditties
text:
[IMGS OFF]

What the hell is this?

name: boredom_man
text:
And you live your life with arms stretched out
Eye to eye when speaking
Enter rooms with great joy shouts
happy to be meeting

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
That...that leer! It's all over the painting!

Is....is it possible Art Frahm and Norman Rockwell were one and the same?

text:

text: I never considered having a turkey drumstick at 6 in the morning before, but boy it sure does sound hell of delicious.
